rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious entrance with a combined living room area embracing Art Deco styling. Features ornate fixtures and geometric patterns in line with the design.

rooms.name: Dining Area / Kitchenette
rooms.description: A functional space with modern kitchenette facilities adjacent to a dining area. Incorporates Vastu principles by aligning the main entrance towards the north.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated workspace designed with ample natural light and sound insulation to ensure productivity. Positioned in a quiet corner of the living area as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Staircase
rooms.description: Provides access to upper floors, designed with decorative elements matching the Art Deco theme and ensuring compliance with local building codes for safety and accessibility.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Positioned on the northern facade to invite positive energy as per Vastu principles.

openings.name: Window Series
openings.description: Multiple windows placed along the eastern and western walls for balanced light distribution.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The main bedroom designed with Art Deco aesthetics. Features built-in closets and a private balcony facing the south for optimal sunlight.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest room, adorned with contemporary Art Deco detailing and natural light.

openings.name: Balcony Access Doors
openings.description: Doors leading to the rooftop terrace for enhanced outdoor living space.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Expansive terrace area offering panoramic views and designed as a multi-functional outdoor space. Features built-in seating and decorative lighting in line with Art Deco themes.

openings.name: Rooftop Door
openings.description: Main access door to the rooftop terrace, carefully positioned following Vastu guidelines.
